title: Two Out of Three Revenge Targets Are Obsessed with Me
Impure Love
summary: No summary available.

title: Link Click
summary: Sitting in a corner of the city is a seemingly normal shop called 'Time Photo Studio'. The shop owners, Cheng Xiaoshi and Lu Guang, can dive back in time through photos. One day, an uprising star in the Chinese opera world — Lin Kai — visited the studio and tasked Cheng Xiaoshi and Lu Guang to find a cassette tape from 10 years ago. They only have one photo, and one chance...

title: A Way to Protect the Lovable You
summary:
Finally, it was their first night.

Leticia whispered, leaning her forehead against his chest, "As expected, is it too far? Should I get closer?"

Dietrian barely swallowed a groan. His hand grasping Leticia's shoulder was shaking with a sweet faze, but she didn't notice.

"I know that you're uncomfortable. But please bear with me until my mother comes."

Dietrian hated Leticia. It was natural as Leticia's mother killed his family. She had never doubted the fact. So she didn't know, how badly his face was distorted by her words.

"You just have to put up with me for half a year. Then, I will divorce you as you wish."

At the word 'divorce,' he grit his teeth.

---
Despite being the daughter of the Holy Empire’s most revered divine leader, Leticia is rumored to be a ruthless, bloodthirsty tyrant. The thing is… none of the rumors are true! After years of living as her vindictive mother’s scapegoat, Leticia is ultimately cursed to die if she doesn’t kill her beloved husband, King Ditrian, with her own two hands. But when the clock miraculously resets to mere days before their wedding, she gets a second chance to save not only Ditrian, but his entire kingdom. This time, will the world recognize the real Leticia before it’s too late, or is history doomed to repeat itself?

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%8B%A4%EC%A0%95%ED%95%9C-%EA%B7%B8%EB%8C%80%EB%A5%BC-%EC%A7%80%ED%82%A4%EB%8A%94-%EB%B0%A9%EB%B2%95/2485), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home/56704518)

* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E5%8F%AA%E6%83%B3%E5%AE%88%E8%AD%B7%E6%BA%AB%E6%9F%94%E7%9A%84%E4%BD%A0/171)

* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%B4%E0%B8%98%E0%B8%B5%E0%B8%9B%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%9B%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%87%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%98%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%9C%E0%B8%B9%E0%B9%89%E0%B9%81%E0%B8%AA%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%94%E0%B8%B5/157)

title: The 139th Night
summary:
The Ran Empire, a country that carries 500 long years of history and the daughter of one of the four major families who aided the emperor at the time of its founding. The daughter who was abandoned as soon as she was born and was raised in the slums.

In front of Salk, who's on the verge of being sold as a concubine to a rotten old man, is a noble young lady. A lady who looks identical to Salk and is claiming to be her twin sister.

Hee-yeon, whose life is in danger, asks her twin sister, Salk, who she met for the first time after 19 years…

---
With its splendid history of five hundred years, Lan Empire has its own share of lights and shadows. Abandoned at birth, Lynx grows up in one of its slums although she is a daughter of the powerful House of Joo, one of four founding families of the empire from its birth. Just as Lynx is about to be sold off as a concubine to a senile old man, a noble lady appears in front of her. Heeyun Joo, the noble lady with a striking similarity to Lynx, claims to be her long lost older twin sister. With her life being extinguished steadily, Heeyun asks that Lynx, her twin younger sister reunited only after 19 years, pose as her.

---
Lynx Joo may be the daughter of one of the Empire's founding families, but being abandoned at birth, she is left to grow up in one of its slums. The future of a woman in the slums is bleak at best, so Lynx is ready for an out. She’s about to be sold off to a senile old man when she’s rescued by a noblewoman who looks just like herself. Claiming to be her older twin sister, Heeyun Joo asks her for a startling favor: to pose as her… or else.

---
[Original Webtoon](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=53648484)

**Official Translations:**
* English: [COPIN](https://copincomics.com/toon/363), [Pocket Comics](https://www.pocketcomics.com/comic/1857), [NetComics](https://www.netcomics.com/comic/17330), [Tappytoon](https://www.tappytoon.com/en/comics/the-13th-night)

title: Ultimate Son-in-Law
summary:
A third-rate writer that is destined to go to hell because of it's bad novel ending, got reincarnated in his own novel instead, reborn as the villainous son-in-law - Li Yu Guo. The battle of wits and courage between him and the original protagonist begins now…  


---

title: The Bad Ending of an Otome
summary:
Could you let me stay at your house?

“Hey, you’ll catch a cold if you stay out here like this!”

Ash Leben, a reincarnator into the world of an otome game, attends the Royal Academy of Magic in the lower-noble class. One rainy day, he encounters Fine Staudt, the game’s main heroine, crouched in a back alley, soaked to the bone. She confides in him that she has been labeled a “villainess” by the Academy’s Four Knights and her friend Elise and is being pressured to withdraw from school.

Determined to help, Ash challenges the Four Knights to a duel, rescuing Fine from her plight. Afterward, Fine asks, “Please let me live with you as the caretaker of your estate,” and thus begins their life together.

This is a school romantic comedy about saving the heroine after her bad ending.

title: Youth Diary
summary: After overcoming a miserable life, she entered the university with an excitement. Dabom, who have million of dreams and desires for university, encountered a villain from her very first day... And it's somewhat awkward/unfitting from the start! "Would my campus life be okay this way?!"

title: A Rain-Kissed Secret
summary:
A yuri anthology focused on boobs! More than a dozen of wonderful authors bringing you some ecchi and funny boob-centric yuri stories!

Cover: [Konbu Wakame](https://mangadex.org/author/580a9899-14f8-4ef6-a156-bcf1ed53e119)
Illustration: Kagawa Yuusaku

**Chapters**:
1. **The Secret Kiss Should Be On The Breasts** by Kurou
2. **I've Become An Adult, Right?** by Hachiko
3. **Being Taught By A JK About The Joys Of One's Gender Who's In Their 30's** by Endo
4. **Drunk Oppai Discussion** by Kanro Ame
5. **Luring Bloom** by Majoccoid
6. **Intense Boobs Discourse** by Homura Subaru
7. **Senpai And Me** by Hisagi
8. **Oppai ≤ You** by Kisaragi Mizu & Doggy
9. **Love Breasts** by Yuino Chiri
10. **Forest of Flower Garden** by Kanda Dan
11. **Oppai Facts** by Guu
12. **The Student Council's Idle Talk** by Itou Hachi

title: I Reincarnated as a Legendary Surgeon
summary:
300 years. 

That was how long it had been since he had last been opened. For 3 whole centuries, the mysterious book of magic, also known as Grimoire, has been stuck on the shelf of the Le Temis Royal Academy Library. 

Just then, an apprentice mage opens the Grimoire, only to die in a freak accident. As the dismayed Grimoire awaits his teleportation to a new location, the library door creeps open and a mysterious girl, Riley, approaches and opens the Grimoire, becoming his new contractor.

title: A Mouse Biting a Dragon’s Tail
24 Hours Resurrection of the Villainess
summary:
The mission window in front of me flashed.

A villainess possessed the body of a lady named Banpoon. A survival-type epic romance where people hide their identities and fall in love!

And the end of the secret relationship.
Who will ultimately win her heart and complete the mission?

title: Prison Love
summary: Makoto is in love with his childhood friend Ai. However, every night he is plagued with a strange dream where there is a station he does not know, the curtain to a chilling suspense story of love and survival opens.

title: The World Without My Sister Who Everyone Loved
summary:
"I hate you enough to want to kill you, Sienna."

I was my sister’s shadow all my life, and I was betrayed by her and died. But… people have changed since the day I came back in time.

"You're the only child Nacht chose."

"His Highness recognizes you as family."

Something's wrong. These people seem to mistake me for my older sister.

"I beg you, believe in us for once, that we care for you."

I once wanted to be loved. Now I fear that this mindset will become my weakness. One betrayal was enough. Everything is over when you bet everything in love. I just want to get my life back so…

---
After being taken in by the noble house of Nacht, Sienna grew up with her adopted sister, Lorena, who she believed to be the sweetest, kindest person in the world. But after Lorena attempts to kill her, Sienna realizes how much her "loving" sister actually hated her. She tries to end her life with a magic potion but ends up going back in time instead. Determined to survive, she tries to use her memories to her advantage. For some strange reason though... Lorena is now nowhere to be found.

title: The Baby Prisoner in the Winter Castle
summary:
On the night the kingdom fell and the entire royal family was being executed, Clarisse, who naturally thought she would also die, heard something unexpected. 

“We cannot execute anyone who has not reached the age of eighteen. Instead, I will kill you the day you turn eighteen.” 

And so, Clarisse is given ten years to live. 
Clarisse then heads North as a “prisoner.” 
And she asks the Grand Duke for only one thing… 

“Um, is it okay if I take this friend with me? It’s my only friend.” 

But what Clarisse holds out is a rock? 

It’s a new life in the North! 
But this life as a “prisoner” keeps on getting better…?

title: My Introverted Boy
summary: Do you ever wonder what the most popular boy at school is really like? As it turns out, he might be just as awkward and shy as any of us. That’s what wallflower Jayu Nam begins to discover after a chance encounter with Jahyeok Yeo, a boy in her class who seems to excel at everything in life. Well, almost. Underneath Jahyeok’s persona is a secret super-introvert who would rather just stay home, except his charming good looks keep forcing him into social situations. Together, Jayu and Jahyeok begin to learn a little something about friendship and maybe more…

title: Misfortune at Work
summary: “A love life? Give me a break.” A complete non-believer when it comes to romance, Eunho is focused on climbing the ladder at work. Smart with excellent social skills to boot, both her bosses and clients love her. But when a new hire suddenly appears in front of her and an old first love start to shake things up again, she can’t help but waver.

title: Thriving Agency for Regretful Male Leads in Full Operation!
summary:
A detective who'll find your leading lady for 500 won has appeared!

Out of all the countless web novel protagonists, I wasn't a romance-fantasy noble lady, a cool hunter, or a holy saintess. Of all things, to think I've been reincarnated as a 'private investigator'… And on top of that, my clients are all regretful male leads?

"Hurry up and find my woman."

"All of a sudden?"

Still, now that I've started, I have no choice but to see it through. Just how many 'runaway lead' stories do you think I've read?! The runaway female lead always gets caught soon enough. They come back one way or another! The cool guy, the hero, the beastly man— I'll make sure all the regretful male leads get their happy ending.

title: I Want to Stop Killing
summary:
Furukawa Koto, the plainest girl in class, desperately wants the elusive Kishi-kun to look at her.

---

Note: This is the original, pre-serialization web comic.

title: Hermes Lover
summary:
Chrome was a magician in the hero’s party. He fought the Demon Lord’s army alongside people like Irina, the lover who vowed to marry him in the future, and the hero, Yuno, who was his close friend. They were all close companions.

However, that was only in Chrome’s mind.

His lover, Irina, became intimate with the hero, Yuno, and Chrome was sacrificed to make the hero stronger. Chrome’s magic powers were snatched away and he was kicked out of the party. Demons surrounded him as he was on the verge of death and he was driven to a corner.

At that moment, Chrome awakened to a “darkness” within himself. Amidst his despair, he acquired an unrivaled skill.

Now with this skill, he could exact revenge.

---

[Webnovel Raw](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n3987fe/)

title: Night of the Soulless Heathens
summary:
Azadin, a member of the cursed Messenger Clan, is born with the worst of curses. Lacking magical prowess, he becomes the lowest-ranking messenger, wandering the continent collecting gold coins in hopes of breaking his curse. 

But when his twin uncovers a great conspiracy, how will he face the impending doom?

title: I Became the Daughter-in-Law of the Righteous Mad Dog
summary: When Isabella woke up, she remembered everything—being poisoned by her in-laws and losing everything at their hands before dying. To avoid being married to the Rosemunds after her parents’ deaths, Isabella will do anything to become the daughter-in-law of Duke Barmouth, the feared "Mad Dog" of the empire. Worried for Isabella’s safety, Lord Barmouth treats her coldly to make her change her mind. But Isabella is set on melting the hearts of everyone at the Barmouth duchy to escape death.

title: The Villainess I Possessed Is Raising Hell
summary:
Isabella Dunkeld is a notorious evil woman, hated by her family and scorned by everyone. 

But things take a strange turn when a powerful demon lord from the demon realm finds herself trapped in her body.

The demon has no memory of making a contract with Isabella, yet here she is, stuck and powerless. 

To avoid revealing her true identity, she must act as human as possible.

title: From Six to Sovereignty: The Girl Who Ruled
summary: Tracy was only 16 when she was sentenced to death. Unloved and unwanted, she died as a forgotten side character in someone else's story. But fate gives her a chance to write her own story as the protagonist this time by sending her back into her six-year-old body. This time, Tracy knows every betrayal coming her way and refuses to be a mere stepping stone again. If survival means becoming the villain, she'll gladly embrace the darkness. Now, let the real story begin.

title: Royal Shop of Young Lady
summary:
Graciela Mendoza was sentenced to death. After her father's death, Graciela, the eldest daughter of a ducal family, was tricked by her uncle into taking over the family home, and was then accused of the crime and decapitated along with her young brother. However, she finds herself back where she was five years ago...? For the second time in her life, she will never make a mistake again. Even if I have to disguise my younger brother as my son, I will survive stubbornly.

---
* [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n3718id/)

title: Resetting Lady
summary:
I entered the world of a novel suddenly. I thought that I could return to reality by falling in love, but death was what awaited me in the end. Defenestration, strangulation, poisoning, drowning, and burning to death... Even after dying a hundred times and returning, the novel still doesn't end...

Karen Haier, who greets her 117th birthday trapped within a novel, now decides to become a murderer.

title: The Prince Meant for You
summary: The 27-year-old Sei Shonagon, depicted here as a sort of medieval NEET, manages to land a job as the private tutor of a beautiful and refined 13-year-old, Princess Teishi. There are also a number of other quirky court ladies, some of whom have their eyes on Shonagon.

title: The Novel’s Extra (Remake)
summary:
Wouldn’t it be a dream to wake up in a world of your own creation? For Kim Hajin, it’s nothing short of a nightmare. 

With no clue how or why he’s been transported into his web novel — as a mere extra, no less! — Hajin has little choice but to see his story through until the end. Lucky for him, as the author, he knows this perilous world like the back of his hand. 

But when discrepancies in the plot begin popping up left and right, Hajin soon realizes that things aren’t quite so simple, after all…

---

**Links:**
- [Webtoon Trailer](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4mamlw_Z8eo)

title: I’m the brave puppy that will save the villainess
Couple Relationship
summary:
"I wish I had a girlfriend, I don't even care who—"
"Really? Anybody? Even me?"

Kaho, who has never had a boyfriend before, wanted to have a male-female relationship.
Takumi, who wanted a girlfriend, just happened to be talking about it in front of her.

---
Alternate Raws: [Pixiv Comic](https://comic.pixiv.net/works/8556)

title: Late Regret
summary:
Uruwashi Maria, a student at the Hananomiya private academy is a strong-willed and selfish "villainess." Her life is on easy mode and she has no enemies, but one day the memories of her past life come to her. Suddenly she remembers that in her previous life she was a normal high school girl. And she’s seen this life of hers play out before in a manga she read in her previous life! According to memories of her past life, Maria is killed by somebody in the manga. "And I don't know who did it because I died before I could read the ending!"  
  
Can Maria avoid her death and find happiness?

title: Winterbell
summary:
One of the four dragons called upon to maintain the balance of the world—the Guardian Dragon of Winter, Seherbian Winterbell. Over time, he grows weary and jaded, burdened by a world that always prays to winter for fear, curses, and misfortune. But when the Dragon Priest who watched over him for years, Rowan, dies, Winterbell decides to finally honor his last wish by stepping out into the world...

"I hope you’ll come to know more of this world.
My dragon, Winterbell."

title: Princess of the Demon King
summary:
There was once a mage called The Lone Demon King on the frontier. He was just a creature that never grew old, but was also loved by the villagers as something of a guardian deity. However, he was destroyed by a magic organization that sees his existence as dangerous. 200 years later, he is reincarnated as the second son of an aristocrat and obtains the strongest magic power.

"Let's pretend to be a human this time."

However, being a human lover, he didn't particularly think of revenge and has decided to pretend to be human in this life. In his past life, he was the guardian deity of a region, and in this life, he's a local aristocrat who lacks common sense. He doesn't know how to take it easy. As the second son of an aristocrat, he is loved by his family and friends, and while he is regarded as a master of magic in the magic guild, he becomes an 'Immortal Mage' behind the scenes.

title: The Youngest Son of the Eunhae Merchant Group
summary:
The youngest son of the Eunhae Merchant Group.

Eun Seoho was born with an unmatched talent for business.

"Why is the Martial Alliance after me...?"
"They say the higher-ups in the Alliance found you bothersome. All because of your money."

Killed by the sword of the so-called righteous Martial Alliance, I suddenly return to the day I first began learning the trade. This time, I swear I won't live with any regrets.

"I'll bring you down with the money you looked down on."

Armed with a genius mind and exceptional martial arts skills, the legendary journey of Eun Seoho, the graetest Merchant Emperor in history, begins!

title: Love Destiny
summary:
"I'll play Gile-sama's "Lover Role" well.." Fiona, a baron's daughter who wants to be independent. One day, Fiona hears she's going to get engaged. While looking for a way to avoid her engagement, she meets Giles, a social nobleman who had the same worries as Fiona. At that moment, her "Fate" begins to move. The royal road to a love romance begins with a contract with a time limit!

---
Fiona Clayburn, a headstrong young noblewoman with a passion for art, has no interest in succumbing to the arranged marriage her father plans for her. Getting married would require her to quit her job at her uncle's art gallery and forsake her independent lifestyle. A fateful meeting with Giles Bancroft, an aloof young man and heir to the earl, presents a way out. Giles, like Fiona, wants nothing more than to stay single, so together, they hatch a scheme to achieve their common goal of avoiding marriage: pretend to be destined lovers!

title: Versatile Sword Cultivator
summary: When video games and real life began to merge, Lin Jichen—the best player in the Dao Realm and the top practitioner of "Eight Worlds"—died as a result of the betrayal of his girlfriend and brother. He fiercely refused rules in his new life and embraced the sword, cutting out the future and rewriting his fate with it! It also allows him to ride the game before it is integrated into reality!

title: Monday to Weekend
summary:
The urban workplace light comedy begins! From Zhou Yi to Zhou Mo, endless laughter everyday! The poorest second-generation millionaire Husky x A hot tempered and intelligent woman in the city. When a Husky becomes a intern, there is no escape from disaster!
"Promotions! Bonuses! Pay raises! Discipline(?) a Husky!"

title: Relationship Principle
summary: While helping a friend confess, Na-yoon unexpectedly receives a confession from the popular Do Seol-woo! Though momentarily shaken by Seol-woo’s unexpected confession, Na-yoon believes that love is still a luxury she can't afford and rejects him. However, Seol-woo isn't ready to give up so easily and asks, "Can't we at least be friends?"

title: Lay Down Your Sword in the Bedroom
Survive as the Villain’s Cousin
summary:
We all know the isekai formula. The MC is always some nobody, they wake up in a perfect body, and they always end up dominating their new world. Sure, Satoru got the first two tropes, but he sure didn’t choose to be reborn as an evil king in his ex-girlfriend’s otome game. He’ll have to quickly figure things out before the hero slays him and his villainess daughter…. all while dealing with sexy magicians, handsy kings and a craving for men’s… *ahem* spiritual energy. Forty-five might be a bit late for a sexual awakening, but better late than never, right?  
  
*Note: This is a all new original English comic.*  


---

title: Subscribing To The Transcendent’s Channel
summary:
Living by selling information about monsters, Maeng Siwoo is considered completely useless in the hunter industry without any standout qualities. However, he fiercely battles to provide for his sick younger sibling.

One fateful day, he is gifted a mysterious smartphone by a transcendent being within a dungeon, appointing him as the channel manager for such beings. Upon subscribing to the channel, he unlocks the ability to wield the powers of the gods.

title: The World-Class Extra’s Walkthrough
summary:
A compilation of loosely-connected stories about weird highschoolers. Several of the stories focus on Hayashi, an aloof and forthright student, while others focus on Nikaidou, a student with a downcast and grim persona.

**Contents:**
1. Someone Cute
2. Would You Be My Friend?
3. The Artist
4. Run, Yamada!
5. Nikaidou Behind Me
6. Nikaidou Extra
7. Nikaidou Behind Me: Angry Class Ver.
8. Nikaidou Behind Me: Terrifying Class Trip Ver.

**Awards:**
- Won the 24th Tezuka Osamu Cultural Prize in the Short Work category in 2020.
- Won the New Face Award from the 23rd Japan Media Arts Festival in 2020.

title: The Magic Tower’s Problem Child
summary: Once the greatest mage and Grand Magus of the White Tower, Oscar Sage dies in a war against The Demon Emperor—only to awaken twenty years later as the disgraced noble, Oscar Crusian. The once-mighty White Tower lies in ruins, and rival factions hold control over military and resources. With his mana circuits sealed and former allies now enemies, Oscar must rebuild the White Tower, seek vengeance, and reclaim his power before the Mage Council exiles him for good. Will magic rise again or will it be buried forever?

title: The Villainess Wants to Coexist
summary:
The Noble Lady binds Tentacle Maid

Sharan, a pious girl, has secured a well-paying job as a maid. Her mission is to serve a prideful, sadistic noble lady named Lynette. However, her job won't simply be that easy....
